title.en: The Last Testament of Kathok Dampa Deshek

text.en: May the teachings of the Buddha remain for long,
text.en-trans: tönpé tenpa yün ring né gyur chik

text.en: May the king of all vehicles flourish and spread,
text.en-trans: tekpé gyalpo shintu dar gyur chik

text.en: May the lives of the holders of the teachings be secure,
text.en-trans: tenpa dzin nam zhabpé ten gyur chik

text.en: May all obstructions to the teachings be eradicated entirely,
text.en-trans: ten la nö nam ming tsam tong gyur chik

text.en: And may this aspiration be a cause for all beings attaining enlightenment.
text.en-trans: dro kün sangye tobpé gyur gyur chik
